name: SimLab VR Viewer
summary: The free SimLab VR Viewer is the best tool to view and share your VR experiences, 3D models, multiple 360 images, and VR collaboration sessions. VR experiences can be created using the free SimLab VR Studio to enable architectural tours, mechanical training, preview sales options, and many other purposes. SimLab VR Studio supports creating VR experiences from a wide range of 3D formats and applications including (SketchUp, Revit, Rhino, SolidWorks, Inventor, AutoCAD, and more).
